txt.en: You have just deconstructed your first Legendary Item. In the result window, you should see a collection of Relics that you have obtained, and depending on the level of the Legendary Item you have deconstructed, potentially a Heritage Rune that you can use to carry over some of the Item's experience to a new item and/or some crafting components.

Legendary items can be enhanced with Traceries that can be found via quests, instance treasures and other sources. Traceries come in four major varieties - Heraldries, Words of Power, Words of Mastery, and Words of Craft. These can each be slotted into the respective slots in your legendary items. Once slotted, a Tracery can be further enhanced using Runes of Enhancement to increase their effective level. Traceries cannot be enhanced to a higher level than the weapon it is slotted in.
